label: Appointment
text: Provide the user with task appointment details.

label: Authentication
text: Prompt user to authenticate with their email address.

label: Password Reset
text: Only use if no other option is available.

label: Create Account (Owl Shoes)
text: Create a brand new account for first time users

label: Confirm your order
text: Form to confirm order before payment is taken

label: Proof of purchase
text: Form to request proof of purchase for a product or service

label: Flight Update
text: Update on flight status for a user who has a flight booked

label: Stock Price
text: Current stock price for Twilio company

label: Product Video (Flex)
text: See Twilio Flex in action in this short video

label: Current Weather
text: Current weather conditions for your location

label: Today's Agenda
text: See what's on your agenda for today

label: PCI Payment Form
text: Secure form to take payment from a customer

label: Refund Request
text: Submit a refund request for a product or service

label: Compatibility Checker
text: Run tests on user device to ensure compatibility with our products

label: Speed Test
text: Run a speed test on the end users device, note if they are on wifi or cellular

label: Address Change (AU)
text: Form to change the users address, all post office fields must be completed

label: Address Change (International)
text: Form to change the users address for international customers

label: IT Service Request
text: Form to request services from the IT department
